title: Lemon top sponge cake
ingredients: ['For the sponge', '225g (8 oz) self raising flour', '225g (8 oz) butter, at room temperature', '225g (8 oz) caster sugar', '4 eggs', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'For the lemon buttercream', '250g (9 oz) icing sugar', '225g (8 oz) butter', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', 'zest of 1 lemon']
